title: [Large-scale] Simulation/VR-Based Online Community of Inquiry Design for Mathematics Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical operations (fractions, decimals, percentages, etc.)
context.additional_context: A course where practicing professionals explore practical mathematical concepts in simulation/VR environments relevant to their work settings, enhancing engagement through community activities.

learning_goals: Explain mathematical modeling processes with ≥80% accuracy to solve task-based problems in VR simulation environments
Engage in social interactions with peer learners through community discussion platforms ≥3 times weekly to share collaborative problem-solving experiences
Achieve ≥75% self-regulated learning (SRL) implementation by creating self-directed learning plans and analyzing weekly learning journals
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
